name: copilotprompts-m365-relationship-investment-scorecard
title: Relationship Investment Scorecard
shortDescription: Analyze Outlook and Teams activity to identify your strongest and weakest professional connections, then get actionable steps to strengthen key relationships.
longDescription: This prompt reviews the past 30 days of Outlook and Teams activity to create a Relationship Investment Scorecard. It identifies your top 10 collaborators by communication volume, highlights 10 under-invested contacts who appear on your calendar or to-do list, and suggests three personalized actions to strengthen your weakest relationship. The output includes a table with communication metrics and scores, a bar chart of top collaborators, and actionable recommendations to improve engagement.
